variable.name: F156VY
variable.comment: Visit year in which this form was collected.

variable.name: F156X2VY
variable.comment: WHI Extension 2 visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F156DAYS
variable.description: F156 Days since randomization or enrollment

variable.name: MOMBORNY
variable.comment: What year was your mother born?

variable.name: DADBORNY
variable.comment: What year was your father born?

variable.name: WTCUR_X2
variable.comment: What is your current weight?

variable.name: FRIENDSNUM
variable.comment: How many close friends do you have?

variable.name: RELATIVESNUM
variable.comment: How many close relatives do you have?

variable.name: RAILINGS
variable.description: Changes to home, railings or banisters
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Railings or banisters.

variable.name: GRABBARS
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Grab bars.

variable.name: RAMPS
variable.description: Changes to home, indoor or outdoor ramps
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Indoor or outdoor ramps.

variable.name: NONSLIP
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Non-slip surfaces.

variable.name: TACKRUG
variable.description: Changes to home, tacking down carpets/rugs
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Tacking down carpets/rugs.

variable.name: CLUTTER
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Decreasing clutter.

variable.name: LIGHTING
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Increasing lighting.

variable.name: COUNTERHT
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Sink/counter heights.

variable.name: HOMEOTH
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. Other.

variable.name: HOMENOCHNG
variable.comment: As people grow older they sometimes need to make changes to their home so that it is a safer and easier place to live. Please read the list below and mark any changes or additions you have made to your home for yourself or someone else. Be sure to mark all that apply. No changes.

variable.name: FALLHOME
variable.comment: In the last year, did you fall at home?

variable.name: EMERGDEVICE
variable.comment: Do you wear a device around your neck or wrist for contacting emergency help?

variable.name: FLUSHOT
variable.description: Flu shot in the past 12 months
variable.comment: During the past 12 months, have you had a seasonal flu shot?

variable.name: PNEUMONIASHOT
variable.comment: A pneumonia shot or pneumococcal vaccine is usually given only once or twice in a person's life and is different from the flu shot. Have you ever had a pneumonia shot?

variable.name: SHINGLESVACC
variable.comment: Have you had the shingles vaccine (also known as the zoster vaccine)?

variable.name: PNEUMONIA
variable.comment: As an adult, have you had pneumonia diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: PNEUMLAST
variable.comment: How long ago was your last pneumonia diagnosed?

variable.name: UTI
variable.comment: Has a health care provider ever told you that you had a urinary tract infection (bladder infection, cystitis, kidney infection, pyelonephritis)?

variable.name: UTILAST
variable.comment: How long ago was your last urinary tract infection?

variable.name: SHINGLES
variable.comment: Have you ever had shingles?

variable.name: SHINGLESLAST
variable.comment: How long ago did you have shingles?

variable.name: EYEDR
variable.description: Last time saw an eye doctor
variable.comment: When was the last time you saw an eye doctor?
variable.value: I do not see an eye doctor

variable.name: GLAUCOMA
variable.comment: Have you ever been told by an eye doctor that you have glaucoma?

variable.name: GLAUCOMAAG
variable.comment: How old were you when diagnosed with glaucoma?

variable.name: GLAUCDROPS
variable.comment:
Has your glaucoma been treated with any of the following?_x000D_
(Mark all that apply.) Eye drops.

variable.name: GLAUCLASER
variable.comment:
Has your glaucoma been treated with any of the following?_x000D_
(Mark all that apply.) Laser treatment.

variable.name: GLAUCOTHSURG
variable.comment:
Has your glaucoma been treated with any of the following?_x000D_
(Mark all that apply.) Other surgery.

variable.name: CATARACT
variable.comment: Have you ever had surgery to remove cataracts?

variable.name: CATARACTAG
variable.comment: How old were you when you had your first cataract extraction surgery?

variable.name: DIABRETIN
variable.comment: Have you ever been told by an eye doctor that you have diabetic retinopathy?

variable.name: DIABRETINAG
variable.comment: How old were you when diagnosed with diabetic retinopathy?

variable.name: DIABRETINLASER
variable.comment: Has your retinopathy been treated with any of the following? (Mark all that apply.) Laser treatment.

variable.name: DIABRETINSURG
variable.comment: Has your retinopathy been treated with any of the following? (Mark all that apply.) Surgery/vitrectomy.

variable.name: DIABRETINSUPP
variable.comment: Has your retinopathy been treated with any of the following? (Mark all that apply.) Nutritional supplement.

variable.name: DRYEYE
variable.comment: Have you ever been told by an eye doctor that you have dry eye syndrome?

variable.name: DRYEYEAG
variable.description: Age at dry eye syndrome diagnosis
variable.comment: How old were you when diagnosed with dry eye syndrome?

variable.name: DRYEYETEARS
variable.description: Dry eye treatment, over the counter tears
variable.comment: Has your dry eye been treated with any of the following? (Mark all that apply.) Over-the-counter artificial tears.

variable.name: DRYEYEDROPS
variable.comment: Has your dry eye been treated with any of the following? (Mark all that apply.) Medicating drops (e.g., Restasis Copyright).

variable.name: DRYEYESUPP
variable.description: Dry eye treatment, fish oil or omega-3 supplements
variable.comment: Has your dry eye been treated with any of the following? (Mark all that apply.) Fish oil or omega-3 supplements.

variable.name: PROXY
variable.description: Have chosen a health care proxy
variable.comment: Have you chosen a specific person you trust to make health care decisions for you in case you cannot speak for yourself?

variable.name: PROXYWHO
variable.comment: Who did you choose to make health care decisions for you? (Mark one.).

variable.name: PROXYDISCUSS
variable.description: Talked about end of life with health care proxy
variable.comment: Have you talked to the person you chose about the type of health care you want if you were very sick or near the end of your life? (Mark one.).
variable.value: Yes, had a very detailed discussion
Yes, but just had a general discussion
No, assume decision maker knows wishes

variable.name: EOLPLAN
variable.description: Plans made if cannot live alone
variable.comment: Have you made plans for what should happen if you become too sick to live on your own? (Mark one.).
variable.value: No, I haven't given it much thought
No, I don't have plans but have thought about

variable.name: LIVINGWILL
variable.comment: An Advance Directive or Living Will are documents that let a person choose how she wants to be treated if she gets very sick and is near the end of her life. Have you filled out a written Advance Directive or Living Will?

variable.name: PROVREFUSE
variable.description: Refused as a patient because on Medicare
variable.comment: In the past year, has a health care provider refused to have you as a patient because you are on Medicare?

variable.name: LT2MEALS
variable.description: Eat fewer than 2 meals per day
variable.comment: I eat fewer than 2 meals per day.

variable.name: EATALONE
variable.description: Eat alone most of the time
variable.comment: I eat alone most of the time.

variable.name: MOUTHPROB
variable.description: Tooth or mouth problems making it hard to eat
variable.comment: I have tooth or mouth problems that make it hard for me to eat.

variable.name: NOTABLEFEED
variable.description: Not able to shop, cook and/or feed self
variable.comment: I am not always physically able to shop, cook and/or feed myself.

variable.name: NOMONEYFOOD
variable.comment: I don't always have enough money to buy the food I need.

variable.name: CELLPHONE
variable.comment: Do you own a cell phone? This is a lead-in question to F156 Q29.1 "Do you send or receive text messages on your phone?" (TEXTMSG), which has a high skip pattern error rate. The skip pattern rules are not applied. The sub-question may contain data when CELLPHONE is missing or 0 (No). You may wish to use the CELLPHONE and TEXTMSG variables in conjunction with each other.

variable.name: TEXTMSG
variable.comment:
Do you send or receive text messages on your phone? Sub-question of F156 Q29 "Do you own a cell phone?" (CELLPHONE). The skip pattern rule is not applied._x000D_
NOTE: this question may contain data that violated the CELLPHONE question's skip pattern rules where CELLPHONE was missing or 0 (No). You may wish to use the CELLPHONE and TEXTMSG variables in conjunction with each other.

variable.name: COMPUTER
variable.comment: Do you use a computer (either at home or away from home)? This is a lead-in question to F156 Q30.1 "Do you use it for email?" (EMAIL) and F156 Q30.2 "Do you use it for Internet?" (INTERNET), which have high skip pattern error rates. The skip pattern rules are not applied. The sub-questions may contain data when COMPUTER is missing or 0 (No). You may wish to use the COMPUTER, EMAIL and INTERNET variables in conjunction with each other.

variable.name: EMAIL
variable.comment:
Do you use it for e-mail? Sub-question of F156 Q30 "Do you use a computer (either at home or away from home)?" (COMPUTER). The skip pattern rule is not applied._x000D_
NOTE: this question may contain data that violated the COMPUTER question's skip pattern rules where COMPUTER was missing or 0 (No). You may wish to use the COMPUTER, EMAIL and INTERNET variables in conjunction with each other.

variable.name: INTERNET
variable.comment:
Do you use it for the internet? Sub-question of F156 Q30 "Do you use a computer (either at home or away from home)?" (COMPUTER). The skip pattern rule is not applied._x000D_
NOTE: this question may contain data that violated the COMPUTER question's skip pattern rules where COMPUTER was missing or 0 (No). You may wish to use the COMPUTER, EMAIL and INTERNET variables in conjunction with each other.

variable.name: SMARTDEVICE
variable.description: Use smart phone, iPad or other device for email or the Internet
variable.comment: Even if you do not use a computer, do you use a "Smart phone," iPad, or other device for email or the Internet?

variable.name: INTERNETHEALTH
variable.comment: Do you use the Internet to look for health information?

variable.name: WHIWEBSITE
variable.comment: Have you looked at the WHI website (www.whi.org)?
